content: it doesn t to catch all of your long floats or none disappoint i did not include this message in my original of them depending on your version of the pattern and i wish to make it very clear that i preference take no credit for the wonderful work someone else has done chart a chart b blocking wet block cowl either before or after grafting using wool wash such as eucalan or soak if desired and air dry enjoy about the designer emma barnaby is a knitter and designer originally from vermont usa where a six-month winter is especially conducive to knitting she especially enjoys knitting and designing fair isle pieces teaching all of her friends how to knit whether they want to or not and finding new and creative storage solutions for seemingly endless balls of shetland wool you can find her on youtube talking about all things fair isle on her show tiny desk knitting on instagram as @barnaby_knits and on ravelry as ebarnaby93
